alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:08AM CDT until June 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Western Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 607 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Snow Lake Shores, or 14 miles east of Holly Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ripley, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Theo, Gravestown, Michigan City, Walnut, Hickory Flat, Ashland, Potts Camp, Falkner, Myrtle, Dumas, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Murry, Brody and Spring Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
